attributes.action: Olympic ticket for my 86 year old mother
attributes.additional_details:
My mother who is 86 was so over joyed when London got the Olympics but hasn't been able to get a ticket I
want the government to give her ticket I'm sure those in government should be sorting out this countries mess not attending a sporting event .Her words have always been I hope I live long enough to see the Olympics !

rejection.details: The London Organising Committee of the Olympic games (LOCOG) is responsible for the Olympic ticketing arrangements.
